items.name: README.md
items.title: üìö Documentation & Quick Start
items.description: Project overview, quick start guide, and script reference. Start here for a high-level introduction to all available features and commands.

items.name: GETTING_STARTED.md
items.title: üöÄ Comprehensive Setup Guide
items.description: Comprehensive step-by-step guide for new users. Covers installation, configuration, automation setup, best practices, and troubleshooting.

items.name: config.example.json
items.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Configuration File
items.description: Centralized configuration file for all scripts. Customize WiFi networks, email settings, backup locations, notification preferences, and scheduling options.

items.name: validate-setup.ps1
items.title: ‚úÖ Validate Setup & Configuration
items.description: Validation tool that checks all scripts, configuration files, system requirements, and Chocolatey installation. Run this first to ensure everything is ready.

items.name: install-chocolatey.ps1
items.title: üç´ Install Chocolatey Package Manager
items.description: Installs Chocolatey package manager with proper configuration and health checks. Essential first step for Windows package management.

items.name: install-essential-apps.ps1
items.title: üíª Install Essential Windows Apps
items.description: Batch installer for essential Windows applications using Chocolatey. Installs browsers, development tools, utilities, and more automatically.

items.name: auto-update-chocolatey.ps1
items.title: ‚ö° Auto-Update Chocolatey & Packages
items.description: Automatically updates Chocolatey and packages when connected to specific WiFi and on power. Includes smart scheduling and safety checks.

items.name: cleanup-chocolatey.ps1
items.title: üßπ Cleanup & Maintenance
items.description: Comprehensive Chocolatey maintenance script. Removes old package versions, clears caches, and optimizes disk usage.

items.name: health-check.ps1
items.title: üè• Health Check & Diagnostics
items.description: Comprehensive diagnostics tool. Checks installation health, system requirements, outdated packages, disk usage, and configuration issues.

items.name: backup-packages.ps1
items.title: üíæ Backup & Restore Packages
items.description: Backup and restore your Chocolatey package list. Perfect for migrating to new machines or disaster recovery scenarios.

items.name: setup-scheduled-tasks.ps1
items.title: ‚è∞ Setup Scheduled Tasks
items.description: Interactive wizard to create Windows scheduled tasks for automated updates and maintenance. Set custom schedules easily.

items.name: Send-ToastNotification.ps1
items.title: üîî Toast Notification Helper
items.description: Helper script for sending modern Windows 10/11 Toast notifications. Used by other scripts for user notifications.

items.name: powershell-scripting-tutorial.md
items.title: üéì PowerShell Scripting Tutorial
items.description: Learn PowerShell scripting using real examples from these scripts. Covers functions, error handling, logging, system detection, and more.

items.name: safety-and-best-practices.md
items.title: üõ°Ô∏è Safety & Best Practices
items.description: Important safety information, pre-installation checklist, emergency procedures, and security considerations for running automation scripts.

items.title: üìù Version History
items.description: Version history with new features, improvements, and bug fixes for each release.
